node.text: You wake up in a mysterious forest. Two paths lie ahead.

a.text: You follow the sunny path.
You encounter a river.
You find a boat by the river.
You sail to a distant island.
On the island, a castle looms ahead.
You enter the castle's main hall.
A wizard offers you a quest.
You journey to the mountain.
At the mountain peak, you find a portal.

b.text: You are attacked by mountain beasts.
You refuse and are teleported home.

a.text: You start a new peaceful life.

b.text: You regret refusing the quest.
You wander into the castle dungeon.

a.text: You find a hidden treasure room.

b.text: You get lost in the dark corridors.
You camp outside and are ambushed by bandits.

a.text: You successfully defend yourself.

b.text: You are captured and imprisoned.
The boat leaks and you swim back to shore.

a.text: You find a friendly trader.

b.text: You are lost in the wilderness.
You build a raft from logs.

a.text: The raft carries you safely downstream.

b.text: The raft breaks and you must swim.
You cross a bridge and meet a trader.

a.text: The trader offers you supplies.

b.text: The trader tricks you and steals your belongings.
You relax by the riverbank and fall asleep.

a.text: You wake up to a rising flood.

b.text: You wake up feeling refreshed.
You follow the dark path.

a.text: You find a glowing cave.
You explore the cave tunnels.
You find ancient ruins inside.
An old spirit gives you a riddle.
You solve the riddle and gain a treasure.
You return home wealthy.
You start a new life as a hero.
You train young adventurers.

b.text: You retire peacefully.
You lose the treasure during your journey.
You fail the riddle and are cursed.
You ignore the spirit and leave.
You get lost in endless tunnels.

a.text: You eventually find an exit.

b.text: You fall into a hidden pit.
You find crystals and get trapped inside.

a.text: You dig your way out.

b.text: You are rescued by dwarves.
You avoid the cave and climb a hill.

a.text: You spot a village from the hilltop.

b.text: You encounter a wild beast.
You stumble and fall into a ravine.

a.text: You find a secret passage underground.

b.text: You are rescued by wanderers.
